data.name: Organ Quarter Pre-Alpha Demo
data.detailed_description:
Organ Quarter is a Survival Horror VR game taking place in an abandoned, nightmarish, and surreal urban environment. Immerse yourself in the overwhelming sense of dread with gun combat, strict resource management, complicated puzzles, and large sprawling areas to explore. This 30-40 minute demo should give you a taste of the misery you've been craving for.

This pre-alpha demo has the option for Analog Touchpad movement, or Teleport Locomotion.

data.short_description: Organ Quarter is a Survival Horror VR game taking place in an abandoned, nightmarish, and surreal urban environment. Immerse yourself in the overwhelming sense of dread with gun combat, strict resource management, complicated puzzles, and large sprawling areas to explore.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS: Windows 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: Intel i5-4590
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD R9 290 equivalent or greater
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
